fixes.name: High Discount Items
fixes.solution_explanation: Replaced [DiscountPct] with 'order_items+'[DiscountPct] and converted the parameter [Parameters].[Discount Threshold %] to SELECTEDVALUE('Discount Threshold %'[Display As]). The expression evaluates to TRUE/FALSE when the row DiscountPct is greater than or equal to the selected parameter value.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references a parameter, and all parameter-based calculations must be measures.
